name: Kooven Arena
description:
Kooven Arena is a pvp voleyball shooter about cooking^^, was mainly thought to be a multiplayer game, so if you can we fully encourage to play it in that way, if it's not posible we had a IA no worries is not the best one, but you will have fun for sure!

You have 2 modes: Singleplayer and Multiplayer, and we have exit but we dont 

recommend that one.

Info^^:

The arena is divided in tiles where you can move, noodles will appear go for them, the hit on the noodles is automatic

Inputs:
  Player One: 
             Movement: WASD
             Shoot: Space
  Player two:
             Movement: Arrow keys
             Shoot: Intro(normal one)

Was made it by 3 people for the Ludum Dare 41:

The current game has updates since the first upload

Art: https://twitter.com/dAguilera10?lang=es

Design: https://twitter.com/Jose31_96

Programming: https://twitter.com/_berttito?lang=es
